title: Scammers have been using Apple’s TestFlight to distribute malicious iOS apps
content:
Apple’s TestFlight is a tool created to help developers distribute their beta apps to users before they are released on the App Store to everyone. However, scammers have been using the platform to distribute malicious apps without Apple’s knowledge.

more…

The post Scammers have been using Apple’s TestFlight to distribute malicious iOS apps appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: TestFlight was created to help developers distribute beta apps. However, scammers have been using it to distribute malicious iOS apps.
